channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Windows Server, version 1909 (Server Core installation)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Windows Server, version 1909 (Server Core installation)

item.title: CVE-2019-1467|2024-08-04T18:20:28.128Z -- microsoft -- windows%20server%2C%20version%201909%20%28server%20core%20installation%29
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when the Windows GDI component improperly discloses the contents of its memory, aka 'Windows GDI Information Disclosure Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1465, CVE-2019-1466.
